issue.title: [Python] Test test_parquet_nested_storage relies on dict item ordering
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10073](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10073). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This causes sporadic test failures on python 3.5, where that ordering is not guaranteed:

https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8240/checks?check_run_id=1154644456#step:8:2885

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10073?focusedCommentId=17200905) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
